entry.title: Hamas Leader Killed in Beirut Was Linchpin of Relations With Iran, Hezbollah
entry.content: Israel, which hasn’t officially claimed responsibility for Tuesday’s killing, is on high alert for retaliatory strikes.

entry.title: How to Put a Lid on Your Drug Costs in 2024
entry.content: Here are tips for controlling your drug spending if you’ve got a deductible that reset upon the new year.

entry.title: Inside a Flaming Jet, 367 Passengers Had Minutes to Flee. Here's How They Did It.
entry.content: On the Japan Airlines plane in the Tokyo airport collision, it took several minutes to get the doors open, the PA system didn’t work and most of the evacuation chutes weren’t available. But a lot went right too.
